description:
Redesign Services Page Hero Section

Update the services page to have a distinct visual identity that differentiates it from the home page, similar to how the portfolio page has its own unique styling.

Requirements:
- Remove or replace the blue colored hero section currently shared with the home page
- Design a new hero layout unique to the services page
- Maintain visual consistency with other unique pages (e.g., portfolio page)
- Ensure the new design clearly communicates the services page purpose
- Update "above the fold" content (first screen before scrolling) to be visually distinct from home page
- Preserve brand consistency while creating differentiation
- Ensure responsive design works across all device sizes

Considerations:
- Review portfolio page implementation as reference for creating page-specific identity
- Consider what content/messaging should be prioritized in the services hero
- Maintain navigation and core UI elements consistent with site-wide patterns
- Test visual hierarchy ensures key service information is prominent
